title: ZED #1
body: The first issue of his mini-series is finally out. I liked the presented premise well enough, but I'm not sure I like {{champion:238}}  design in this comic. What do you guys think?

replies.body:
I don't think he has his full armor yet so it will likely change as it progresses

but it is cool

Yeah actually we will be seeing all of the characters in a variety of outfits.   His plate armor with giant spikes and fan sized Shurikens is Zed's war gear, not his everyday wear or what he wears during most undercover missions.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=F2itwHPR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-21T22:11:54.058+0000)
>
> Yeah actually we will be seeing all of the characters in a variety of outfits.   His plate armor with giant spikes and fan sized Shurikens is Zed's war gear, not his everyday wear or what he wears during most undercover missions.

Zeds just like "come on people plate armor all the time? really? I'd get sore no thanks"
i think its cool to see what zed looks like in a more casual manner
Hey Odin can I ask if any of the other members of the group traveling with Zed have names outside of Kayn and Jovn, maybe Yusari or Ren from Legends of Runeterra

I do not like the art. Not at all.

Seems to be building to a good story tho.
